data.field:
IPC::SysV defines and conditionally exports all the constants defined in your system include files which are needed by the SysV IPC calls.

ftok( PATH, ID )

Return a key based on PATH and ID, which can be used as a key for [perlfunc:msgget|msgget], [perlfunc:semget|semget] and [perlfunc:shmget|shmget]. See ftok
